page.title: 07Employment in Guisborough
page.content: Employment in our area has dropped considerably in the last 20 years. At present Cleveland has over 20% unempl. (2nd only to Northern Ireland in the UK),& Langbaurgh (our District) is above the Cleveland average. Unemployment for school leavers is much higher than the average for adults. The main local employers are Blackett Hutton, a small steel works in Guisborough; a clothing factory owned by Burtons; and the Guisborough shops.Within a 12 mile radius there are the major employers on Teesside, especially ICI and British Steel. School leavers can join a 1-year YTS scheme, & there are several 100 16-to-18-year-olds from our area on schemes ranging from hair- dressing to fishing to local govern- ment. But many middle-aged men made redundant have no such scheme.
